22
Workflow Motifs
•Workflow motif:  Domain independent conceptual abstraction on the workflow 
steps.
1.
Data-oriented motifs: What kind of manipulations does the workflow have?
•E.g.: 
•Data retrieval 
•Data preparation
• etc.
2.     Workflow-oriented motifs: How does the workflow perform its operations?
•E.g.:
•Stateful steps
•Stateless steps
•Human interactions
•etc.
WHAT?
HOW?
speaker: SYSTEM
